      <title><![CDATA[Guard yourself against sudden cardiac arrest: Beware of palpitations]]></title>
      <link>http://www.business-standard.com/article/current-affairs/guard-yourself-against-sudden-cardiac-arrest-beware-of-palpitations-118021700778_1.html</link>
